errors.question: What are some notable works by Ugandan authors?
errors.predicted: - 'Song of Lawino' by Okot p'Bitek (1966) - 'Abyssinian Chronicles' by Moses Isegawa (1998) - 'Kintu' by Jennifer Makumbi (2014) - 'The Last King of Scotland' by Giles Foden (1998) - 'The Activist' by John Nagenda (1976) - 'Weer in the World' by Beatrice Lamwaka (2013) - 'Love in the Time of Scandals' by Doreen Baingana (2019) - 'The Triangle of Hope' by David Rubadiri (1997) - 'Black Mamba' by Kakwenza Rukirabasaija (2014)
